custom-action.name: Connect
custom-action.description:
This action opens a new SAP connection. The established connection is contextual to the User Path and will be used to perform all the other actions (Click, Press, etc.). When connectionString and connectionName parameters are both provided, the connectionString parameter will be used.
Possible parameters are: - connectionString (optional): The connection parameters to the SAP GUI server. Default value is "/H/192.168.1.1/S3201". - connectionName (optional): The connection name in SAP Logon. - overrideLogonFolder (optional): The path to the SAP logon folder. Leave empty for autodetection or setting on Load Generator side. - noGuiMode (optional): GUI mode disabled. During a "Check User Path" process, the GUI mode is always enabled. When enabled, screenshots are taken on errors. Default value is "true". - sapBusinessClient (optional): If "true", connect to SAP Business Client instead of SAP Logon. False by default. Default value is "false".
